remarks: Lemma F in [Crawley] p. 116.  If u is an atom under w, there exists a translation whose trace is u.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Apr-2013.)
statement:
cdlemf.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemf.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemf.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemf.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemf.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemf $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( U e. A /\ U .<_ W ) ) -> E. f e. T ( R ` f ) = U ) $.
$d .<_ f $.
$d A f $.
$d H f $.
$d K f $.
